name: @oazmi/esbuild-types
description: this library simply re-exports esbuild's typescript declarations file, so that your client won't have to install esbuild just for its types only.
author: Omar Azmi

build-docs.description:
generates github-pages compatible documentation site for the library.
uses the `buildDocs` field in `deno.json` for configuration.
depends on `npm:typedoc` and `jsr:@oazmi/build-tools`.

build-npm.description:
converts the library code to a nodejs compatible project.
uses the `buildNpm` field in `deno.json` for configuration.
depends on `jsr:@deno/dnt` and `jsr:@oazmi/build-tools`.

update-proj.description: updates the type-definitions to esbuild's latest major+minor version.

local-server.description: run a basic local file server, possibly for checking the generated docs or interactive examples.
